programme.desc: Gran Premio Red Bull di San Marino e della Riviera di Rimini - Σπριντ. Η COSMOTE TV σας θυμίζει τους αγώνες που ξεχώρισαν στο πρωτάθλημα του 2024 του MotoGP και οδήγησαν τον Χόρχε Μαρτίν στην κατάκτηση του 1ου του τίτλου. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Διατσίδης.

programme.title: Τένις: Φακούντο Ντίας Ακόστα - Στέφανος Τσιτσιπάς
programme.desc: ATP 500 2024. Βαρκελώνη. Προημιτελικός. Τα τουρνουά ATP 500 ανήκουν στην 4η βαθμίδα των ετήσιων διοργανώσεων τένις σε επίπεδο ανδρών. Η σειρά αυτή αποτελείται από 13 τουρνουά, με τον νικητή σε καθένα από αυτά να λαμβάνει 500 πόντους κατάταξης. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Τένις: Φελίξ Οζέρ-Αλιασίμ - Αντρέι Ρούμπλεφ
programme.desc: ATP Masters 1000 2024. Μαδρίτη. Τελικός Μονού. To ATP Masters είναι μια σειρά από 9 τουρνουά τένις, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour. Οι διοργανώσεις διεξάγονται στην Ευρώπη, τη Βόρεια Αμερική και την Ασία. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Κυφωνίδης.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: Next Gen ATP Finals 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τα στιγμιότυπα των κυριότερων αγώνων των τουρνουά ATP, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour.

programme.title: Nitto ATP Finals 2024 - Στιγμιότυπα
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τα στιγμιότυπα των κυριότερων αγώνων των τουρνουά ATP, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour.

programme.title: Topspin
programme.desc: Η μοναδική εκπομπή για το τένις, φιλοξενεί πλούσια αγωνιστική επικαιρότητα και θεματολογία από το χώρο του τένις, στην Ελλάδα και το εξωτερικό.

programme.title: Βόλεϊ: Γκίσεν - Ολυμπιακός
programme.desc: CEV Champions League Ανδρών 2025. Φάση Ομίλων, 4η Αγωνιστική. Η 66η σεζόν του CEV Champions League Ανδρών φιλοξενεί 20 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων. Η ιταλική Τρεντίνο είναι η κάτοχος του τροπαίου. Περιγραφή: Πάνος Λούτας.

programme.title: Στιγμιότυπα ATP 2024 - Ανασκόπηση
programme.desc: Παρακολουθήστε τα στιγμιότυπα των κυριότερων αγώνων των τουρνουά ATP, στα οποία συμμετέχουν οι κορυφαίοι της κατάταξης στο ATP Tour.

programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: FIP World Padel Championships 2024
programme.desc: Οι κορυφαίοι παίκτες padel από 16 χώρες συναντώνται στο Κατάρ, με στόχο να διεκδικήσουν τον τίτλο του Παγκόσμιου Πρωταθλητή. Περιγραφή: Δημήτρης Ξαρλής.

programme.title: FIP World Padel Championships 2024
programme.desc: Οι κορυφαίοι παίκτες padel από 16 χώρες συναντώνται στο Κατάρ, με στόχο να διεκδικήσουν τον τίτλο του Παγκόσμιου Πρωταθλητή. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Βασιλείου.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Χάντμπολ: Λειψία - Ανόβερο
programme.desc: DAIKIN Hanball Bundesliga 2024-25. 17η Αγωνιστική. Η 60η σεζόν του γερμανικού πρωταθλήματος χάντμπολ διαρκεί από τον Αύγουστο του 2024 έως και τον Ιούνιο του 2025. Από τις 18 ομάδες που συμμετέχουν, δύο υποβιβάζονται, ενώ οι 5 πρώτοι εξασφαλίζουν ευρωπαϊκό εισιτήριο. Το Μαγδεμβούργο κέρδισε τον περσινό τίτλο. Περιγραφή: Παύλος Παλαιστής.

programme.title: Topspin
programme.desc: Η μοναδική εκπομπή για το τένις, φιλοξενεί πλούσια αγωνιστική επικαιρότητα και θεματολογία από το χώρο του τένις, στην Ελλάδα και το εξωτερικό.

programme.title: Sports Classics: Worldies

programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides sports news, highlights and analysis.

programme.title: SportsCenter

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Owls and Shockers start their American Athletic Conference seasons at the Liacouras Center. Temple won both meetings in 2023-24. Wichita State's last Division I test was a resounding 84-65 victory over Kansas State behind Xavier Bell's 24 points.

programme.title: Live: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Hawks play the Billikens as both teams move into 2025. Saint Louis had won five straight meetings prior to Saint Joseph's last-second, 87-86 triumph Feb. 10, 2024. Xzayvier Brown (JOES) went off for 27 points and seven assists in the win.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A TV personality drives to a small-town mountain retreat. On her way, a blizzard veers her off the road and she crashes. When she awakens, she has complete amnesia, and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: Catch Me if You Claus
programme.desc: Avery Quinn's shot at anchoring news clashes with a Santa-suited intruder, Chris, who insists he's Santa's son on a first Christmas mission. They unravel a career-making story together.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Scouting for Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: A woman meets long-lost relatives for the first time after discovering her family tree during the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: A lawyer makes a deal with the heir to a development firm to spare her family's restaurant from demolition. However, she must spend the week posing as the legal counsel his father is demanding he hire in the wake of some costly mistakes.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: Checkin' It Twice
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a hockey player and a real estate agent after he moves into a cottage in her family's backyard.

programme.title: When I Think of Christmas
programme.desc: Sara reunites with her ex-boyfriend, Josh, when she returns to her hometown to help her mother move. When Sara makes a surprising discovery, she and Josh forge a bold plan for an upcoming Christmas concert that takes them back to their musical roots.

programme.title: Happy Howlidays
programme.desc: Mia, a meticulous webpage editor for the Seattle Tourism Board, finds herself unexpectedly navigating the holidays alone. As the only one working, she's drawn into an unusual encounter when she encounters a stray dog.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: Del, Kat, Alice and Elliot each receive answers about their past and present, while hope for the future brings new questions.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: Christmas Town
programme.desc: Lauren leaves everything behind in Boston to embark on a new chapter in her life and career. On an unforeseen detour to the town of Grandon Falls, she discovers love and family, helping her to embrace the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Leah's Perfect Gift
programme.desc: A Jewish Leah accompanies her boyfriend to Connecticut to experience a traditional Christmas with his family.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: Three generations of strong and independent women living together in the small farm town of Port Haven embark on an enlightening and surprising journey none of them could have imagined as they learn how to find their way back to each other.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: Founder's Day in Port Haven brings up memories for Del, Alice and Elliot; Kat finds herself caught between two worlds in her search for answers.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: The Landry women reach an emotional climax as Kat works to conjure up a rescue, while Alice sees Del through a wave of grief as old wounds are opened. Stars Andie MacDowell, Chyler Leigh, Evan Williams, Sadie Laflamme-Snow.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: The Landry women learn things aren't always as they seem as each uncovers new past and present truths. Elliot questions how much of Kat's heart is in 1814. Stars Andie MacDowell, Chyler Leigh, Evan Williams, Sadie Laflamme-Snow.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: Del, Kat, and Alice learn how events of the past have shaped their family's present. Alice learns a secret that affects her relationship with Elliot. Stars Andie MacDowell, Chyler Leigh, Evan Williams, Sadie Laflamme-Snow.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: All three Landry women feel the absence of a key ally in their lives as they struggle to make life-altering decisions and choices. Stars Andie MacDowell, Chyler Leigh, Evan Williams, Sadie Laflamme-Snow.

programme.title: The Way Home
programme.desc: Del, Kat, Alice and Elliot each receive answers about their past and present, while hope for the future brings new questions.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes transformed as she works toward granting a little girl's wish for a Christmas like she used to have with her mother.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season for Love
programme.desc: An out-of-work actress (Sarah Lancaster) finds romance after returning to her quaint hometown during Christmastime.

programme.title: Welcome to Christmas
programme.desc: A developer finds herself stranded in Christmas, Colo. The town hopes to employ the Christmas spirit to convince her that the community is the best location for a new ski resort.

programme.title: The Gift of Peace
programme.desc: Traci is a once-devout Christian who stopped believing in God after her husband tragically died despite her prayers. As her second Christmas without him approaches, she tries going to a support group for inspiration and comfort.

programme.title: Northpole: Open for Christmas
programme.desc: During Christmastime a handyman and an elf persuade a businesswoman to keep the inn that she inherited from her aunt.

programme.title: Romance at Reindeer Lodge
programme.desc: Molly and Jared have both sworn off holiday events. When they find themselves stuck at a Christmas-themed ranch, they have no choice but to allow their cynical hearts to melt.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Every Christmas Has a Story
programme.desc: While on air, a TV personality accidentally admits she hates Christmas. When she goes to a small town to film a special to repair her image, the Christmas spirit begins to change her life.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: A high-powered executive reconsiders her priorities when car trouble leads her to Christmas Valley, a town in love with Christmas.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: My Christmas Guide
programme.desc: After losing his eyesight, a college professor adopts a seeing-eye dog from a guide dog trainer. As they all spend time together, his confidence returns and his heart begins to open.

programme.title: Ms. Christmas Comes to Town
programme.desc: After receiving a terminal diagnosis, a shopping channel host known as Ms. Christmas embarks on a multi-city excursion to spread holiday cheer before her farewell broadcast.

programme.title: Under the Christmas Sky
programme.desc: Sparks fly between astronaut Kat and by-the-book David when they work on a planetarium exhibit that's opening right before Christmas.

programme.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: A Timeless Christmas
programme.desc: A man travels from 1903 to 2020, where he meets a tour guide at his historic mansion and gets to experience a 21st century Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: Hope at Christmas
programme.desc: Sydney decides to spend Christmas in a house she inherited with her young daughter. When she meets Mac, he tries to make her Christmas wishes come true by helping her open herself up to life, love, and believing in the spirit of Christmas again.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a mysterious key and a cryptic holiday riddle arrive on their doorsteps, Kate and Kevin embark on a romantic Christmas adventure.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A department store manager sets out to create an amazing holiday display window to impress the owner. She asks a recently-fired employee to help her make the display, and as they work together, they start to fall in love.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
